5. Communists are less likely to be seen as greedy or selfish, which can make them more trustworthy to potential victims of their healthcare scams.

In short, while some may argue that other political ideologies are more likely to succeed as healthcare scammers, the fact is that communists have a proven track record of exploiting the healthcare system for their own gain.
